content.rendered:
PRIVACY POLICY

Last Updated: March 1, 2025

1. INTRODUCTION

Manas Merchandise Pvt. Ltd. (“we,” “us,” or “our”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or engage with our IT Hardware & Security Solutions services.

2. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

We may collect the following types of information:

Personal Information:

  • Contact details (name, email address, phone number, business address)
  • Inquiries and communication history
  • Service and product preferences

Technical Information:

  • IP address and device information
  • Browser type and settings
  • Cookies and usage data
  • Website interaction patterns

3. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

We use the collected information for:

  • Providing, operating, and maintaining our website and services
  • Improving and personalizing your experience
  • Understanding website usage patterns and effectiveness
  • Communicating with you regarding inquiries, services, and updates
  • Internal record keeping and business operations
  • Marketing and promotional purposes (with your consent)

4. COOKIES AND TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES

Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activities. These technologies help us analyze website traffic, customize content, and improve user experience.

You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling cookies may affect functionality of certain website features.

5. DATA SECURITY

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

6. DATA BREACH APPROACH

In the event of a data breach that compromises your personal information, we will:

  • Investigate the incident promptly to identify affected data and individuals
  • Take immediate steps to contain and remedy the breach
  • Notify affected individuals within 72 hours of discovery when feasible
  • Provide clear information about the nature of the breach and steps taken
  • Cooperate with relevant authorities as required
  • Review and strengthen our security practices to prevent future incidents

7. THIRD-PARTY DISCLOSURE

We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

8. CHILDREN’S PRIVACY

Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

9. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the “Last Updated” date.

10. CONTACT US

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: 

info@manasit.in | 080-41247688
